item.title: Red Hot Chili Peppers - Otherside - Key of Am - Ukeledu Music
item.description: Play along video for the song Otherside by Red Hot Chili Peppers from the channel Ukeledu Music. Chords used in the song: Am, C, C6, Cmaj7, Em, Em9, F, G.

item.title: Red Hot Chili Peppers - Scar Tissue - Key of F - Ukulele Underground
item.description: Play along video for the song Scar Tissue by Red Hot Chili Peppers from the channel Ukulele Underground. Chords used in the song: C, F, G.

item.title: Red Hot Chili Peppers - Under The Bridge - Key of E - Ukulele Underground
item.description: Play along video for the song Under The Bridge by Red Hot Chili Peppers from the channel Ukulele Underground. Chords used in the song: A, Am, B, C♯m7, E, Emaj7, F, G.
